titleStmt.title: Catalogue of Tamil Manuscripts (BnF) by Feer

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary:
A catalogue of the Tamil manuscripts in the now BnF by Léon Feer, according to the title on the spine.

The codex contains: a list of 63 manuscripts (Tamil, Sanskrit) sent by the Jesuits of Pondicherry (U1) an alphabetical list of the Tamil works in the BnF manuscripts: title in Tamil transcription, title in Roman transliteration, translation in French (in red ink), and shelfmark (U2)

Composite manuscript described as a multi-text manuscript for the sake of convenience.

Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.
